channel.title: How to make your charackter admin (in your own server)
channel.description: If you have made a server or downloaded a source and made a server.. Whatever if you want to make your charackter admin you log in on your server, then log out and you go on the map "charackters" then you find the charackter you made. Now go on it and you find something like:(example) charackters rights-0 change it to 3 if you owner.. you will also find: charackter-ismember 1.. change that to 3 also .. you can change those too if to different numbers (1-3) to get [u]mod, admin or owner.[/u] [b]Good Luck Bloop[/b] ;) ;)

item.title: How to make your charackter admin (in your own server)
item.dc:creator: @bloop bloop
item.description:
@bloop wrote:

If you have made a server or downloaded a source and made a server… Whatever if you want to make your charackter admin you log in on your server, then log out and you go on the map “charackters” then you find the charackter you made.
Now go on it and you find something like:(example) charackters rights-0 change it to 3 if you owner… you will also find: charackter-ismember 1… change that to 3 also … you can change those too if to different numbers (1-3) to get mod, admin or owner.
Good Luck
Bloop

Read full topic
item.source: How to make your charackter admin (in your own server)
